name: Please Behave at the Penguin Rave
name_original: Please Behave at the Penguin Rave
description:
Can i see your ticket?

Make a big mess in this penguin party before the time runs out. Guns tend to help you with that. But don't worry, no penguins get hurt when playing this game. Some of them even join your mayhem party.

Made by Adrian Kaminski

Premade Assets:
.Sound effects from Freesound.org or GDC audio bundle (all non copyrighted)

.Font from DaFont ( Arista Pro ) (free for non-commercial use)

.Music: Marnik, SMACK - Gam Gam (Creeds Remix), edited to remove the copyrighted song parts
